summary: This document contains various Schedule K-1 forms related to the partnership MIDWAY ASHLEY CROSSING, LLC and its partner BLUE CHIP CAPITAL LLC for the tax year 2012. It details the partners' shares of income, deductions, and other financial information relevant to their partnership. The document highlights the financial performance and tax obligations of the partnership. This document contains various financial records and tax-related information for the partnership Midway-Carolinas LLC and its partner Blue Chip Capital LLC for the year 2012. It includes details about income, deductions, credits, and other financial activities relevant to the partnership's tax filings. This document contains various financial records related to the partnership MIDWAY-MOUNTAINEER, LLC and its partner BLUE CHIP CAPITAL LLC for the tax year 2012. It includes details about income, deductions, credits, and other financial adjustments relevant to the partners' tax filings. This document contains financial information related to the partnership Midway Plantation LLC and its partner Blue Chip Capital LLC for the tax year 2012. It includes details about income, deductions, credits, and the partners' shares of profits and losses. This document contains financial information related to various partnerships, including tax credits, deductions, and income distributions for the year 2012. It includes details about partners' shares of income and deductions, as well as specific financial figures associated with the partnerships mentioned. This document contains various tax-related schedules and forms for the partnership MIDWAY TRIAD, LLC, including K-1 forms for partners, detailing income, deductions, and credits for the year 2012. It includes information about partners such as BLUE CHIP CAPITAL LLC and their respective shares of income and deductions. This document contains tax-related information for Boardwalk Pipeline Partners, LP for the year 2012, including various schedules and instructions for partners. It emphasizes the importance of reviewing the ownership schedule and provides contact information for corrections.
